content.detailedDescription:
These pics were taken when my 11yo son and i were on the eureka sky deck (on the 84th floor of a sky scraper in melbournecbd) last year looking out to the west/north west...
in the 1st pic a strange blue disc shaped object appeared and looked to be flying at great speed toward the city.
i only had time to take 1 more pic where u can see that it's much more defined
& then before i could get another shot off, it appeared to stall then shoot up thru the clouds in less than a second. i can only estimate it's speed at many thousands of km per hour as it streaked up thru the cloud cover.
both kye and i were pretty freaked out, as were a few other people that got a quick glimpse before it went vertical and out of sight. 
i haven't said anything until now coz i didn't wanna be called crazy or that i was only imagining it. 
i've since thought about it and no longer care what people think of me, nor do i care if they beleive me... the pics are there... there were multiple witnesses and i know what i saw. 
the aerial maneuvering capabilities that this thing had were nothing short of unbelievable & when it seemed to slow then shoot upwards at massive speed... instantly... all i could do is be in awe. 
there's only 1 conclusion...
i was lucky enough to catch an unidentified flying object of some sort, either terrestrial or extra terrestrial in origin in the western sky's of melbourne that night. 

enjoy
content.summary: Came from west, stalled then shot thru clouds

content.detailedDescription: This event took place back in 1975 i was inside my house and somebody in the patio was screaming i went to see what the trouble was and the person started it pointing me out to the sky, i raised my head up and there it was a huge saucer with red lights around the edge and center bottom suspended in the air, didn��t make any noise. the metal part was a gray mate color. i climbed to a mango tree and got up in the roof of the house, i laid down facing up an expecting something to happen but never did nor was afraid to have it real close enough to see details of the ufo, after about a minute that i was looking at, flown away so fast at speed that goes beyond my imagination. recently, about two month ago i found two other people that saw the same event; we recreated the experience from that day. there were a lot of people they said, who witness the ufo. there was at least 4 witness.
content.summary: The object did look like a saucer shape, with red lights in the edge and bottom. the metal part was a gray mate color.

content.detailedDescription:
Wish to start out by your review of video and i will give you the one but from the same event i have two others.

thank you... just want you to know that the video i am sending is on lower quality than i possess but please have a look at this first... just doing this due to file size... also, notice the sound of the military helicopters right at the end of the video and i know my batters were charged well and yet right then the camera dies... check file date for approximate time...    

sincerely,

ron l. schille

p.S. i am sorry for my fowl mouth while filming...
content.summary: Just would like you to see what i video taped and if you would tell me what you people think.

content.detailedDescription: I am a retired nj law enforcement officer. i made a report some time ago aout other events. since then, there have been other events i observed that i did not report. tonight however i want to report a very large bright red light i observed in the nnw sky at approximately 2130 hours. the duration was about 2 minutes or less. i intially was outside cooking on the grill. i made a report some time ago with mufon and spoke with a gentleman from glouster nj. i have had a few other observations i would like to discuss that occured previously to this one. the object i observed was intense in color and magnitude, it was large, red and very bright, constant in magnitude. it was about 2 degrees above the treeline to the nnw from my position.  i live in mercerville nj. the light slowly descended downward. i ran back into the house to get my wife who also observed the light until it became unobservable in the treeline which has no foliage. there is a ang detachment at mercer airport in the princeton nj area which lies in a crow fly direction from my location towards that general direction. i have no experience with military flares so i can't say if this sighting falls within a military exercise. i have never seen anything unusual in the area or general direction i may ad. the only thing i regulaly see in that vicinity or quadrant of the sky is commercial aviation. i have an extensive knowledge of military, commercial aviation, and aerospace. so if it's up there i can identify things if it's from us. this was unique. please feel free to contact me.
content.summary: Retired law enforcement. observed an extremely high magnitude constant  red light with no variation slowly descend in the nnw sky at 2130 hrs. i have had other encounters before. mercer airport has a ang detatchment. was it a flare?  unique sighting 4me.

content.detailedDescription: Was sitting on the front porch enjoying the evening when suddenly 10 to 15 lights appeared in the sky.  they seemed to hover for a couple of minutes at some distance apart.  they then began to move together.  after that they took off in a westerly direction.  whole thing lasted about ten minutes tops.  did get a little video but very shaky.  some of the ufo's seemed to dart off at crazy speeds and were out of view in seconds while others seemed to slowly move off in a westerly direction.
content.summary: Basically it looked like a phoenix lights event best way to describe it.

content.detailedDescription: This is my second ufo report. i have more pictures and videos to post. ive been seeing the same things almost every night. someone really needs to look into this. there are always disc and triangular shaped objects with pulsating blinking lights that blink randomly. they seem to be flying to the same place near otisville ny. i can see them flying in that direction sometimes in other areas too. they also seem to be descending below the treeline.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Blinking,pulsating lights on disc shaped object; hovered and descended below treeline;also flew straight up into the sky

content.detailedDescription:
On a perfect spring morning in may 2012,(no wind or clouds)i went out into my small back yard to see what my terrier was barking at.  it was a glittering metallic object that appeared to be at about 5000 ft altitude.  i thought it was probably a mylar balloon or something similar, and went back into the house.  a few minutes later i went out again and the object was lower and i could see that it was triangular.  i watched it as it descended  very slowly.  the triangle was rotating very slowly in the horizontal plane, but the axis of rotation appeared wrong.  the motion was slow and mechanical with no fluttering or quick movement.  the triangle was not falling; it was descending in what appeared  to be a very deliberate and controlled manner.
i watched for about five minutes until it seemed that the triangle would land in my yard.  i ran into the house when the thing was about 50 feet above me, and waited for the crash.  i looked out the window and didn't see the triangle in my back yard as expected, so i went out again, and saw the triangle moving off to the north at treetop level and at the same very slow speed.
the object was curved on the underside much like a speedboat bottom.  i never saw the top of it.  the transom at the rear was inset about 4 inches, and that is the only thing i saw that looked like a seam  i saw no rivets either.  it appeared to be a single sheet of polished aluminum or stainless steel.  there was a pointed bright red mast about 5 feet long sticking out of the nose, and attached to it was a bright red triangle that looked like a small pennant.  however, it was rigid and aligned in the horizontal position.  there were no marks or damage visible.  the thing looked pristine and brand new.  overall length including the mast was about 35 or 40 feet.  the width at the widest point was about 12 feet.
content.summary: Triangle or dart shape; bright metal; sharp mast 5 feet long on the nose end

content.detailedDescription:
I was laying the frontroom floor in front of the wood stove.  i was awoke by bright light in my face coming from outside.  i got up and looked out the window and saw a triangular craft glowing going up and down, sideways and flipping upside down and back around again.
the whole event lasted about 10 minutes and was a beautiful and interesting sight.
i got a picture of it on my phone which i am sending to you. one is the orignal picture and the other one is blown up to see.
after ten minutes the object went in a northeastern direction and disapeared.
content.summary: There was a ufo outside the window that was so bright it woke me up.

content.detailedDescription: My son kamdin and i were coming across the snake river heading north east on the bridge by simplots when i saw a triangle shaped object hovering just above the simplots plant. the object was dark gray/black. it was only a couple hundred feet above the plant so i could see all the detail in the bottom of the object. it made absolutely no sound and had no lights. it was about 7pm so the sun was already at the west horizon. so i could not see any lights. it slowly started moving northeast at a very very slow speed. we were on our way home which is only about half a mile from when we saw this object. instead of turning left after the bridge to go home i stayed on the burley rupert highway and tried to follow it to get a longer better look. we were able to follow it almost 6 miles when it changed direction and went east where i could no longer keep up with it. i was very excited to follow this object and hoped i would be able to get closer but could not. after seeing this object i told anyone who would listen , especially some co-workers who have had their own sightings. one guy has had many and more interesting than mine. i have no sketch but could sketch what we saw if needed.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: My son kamdin an i came across the bridge and i told him that there was something flying above simplots. we watched it and followed it until ee couldnt.

content.detailedDescription:
I own a cabin near colebrook nh, myself and 2 friends were opening the cabin for the season, and sitting outside by campfire, i was spotting mars in the west, and jupiter in the east, we were for awhile spotting and counting satellites, being that far from any major city, there is not much light pollution, we had very dark skies as the moon had not yet risen, i asked my 2 friends to come over to where i was, pointed out jupiter and then above me, at approx. 75% angle i saw a brilliant flash, like you would if a meteorite had broken apart in the upper atmosphere, one of my friends saw it too, and we turned to each other and said, "did you see that flash?" the object that flashed appeared to be a satellite, traveling from west to east, it made a 5* arc and then flashed brilliantly again, this time all 3 of us saw it, after the second flash, it changed direction from west to east, to ese, we then watched it for another 2-3 minutes waiting for it to flash again, it never did. but as we watched, it got brighter, then dimmer, then brighter again, over and over, but at no regular interval, we couldn't see a pattern, 
we then discussed what we saw, weve seen hundreds of satellites over the years, and never seen one flash, or change brightness like this. there was no sound associated with it. and we were all sure that it was not an airplane or helicopter, my 2 friends are both prior military, and have never seen anything like it. i grew up going to pease afb everyday when i was a kid, and come from an air force family. we cant make sense of it, and we are hoping someone else saw it too. thank you.
content.summary: Thought we saw a sat. it flashed, changed direction, flashed again

content.detailedDescription:
Three of us were out one evening riding atv's along the ridge when we saw the ufo. at first we thought it was a some sort of small hot air balloon that was lit up. it was moving very quickly from south to north, then when it was almost out of sight it flashed in a multicolor of lights and almost looked as if it blew up. afterwards, we examined the photographs we had taken and came to the conclusion that it was not what we had previously thought. +

this object did not make any sound , just movement , it was a beautiful site  and was like a christmas tree . object was too fast to be a balloon , my son got very excited and nervous at the same time not knowing what this was . i'am 52 years old and have never seen anything like this before making me also wonder what this was , i firmly believe it was not anything made by earth men .I also have 1 picture that i had took , i have a new camera and could not get any more . please review and respond to my request and thank you for your time .
content.summary: Three of us was on top of ridge aronnd dusk. ufo quickly appeared from south.Moving north. it lite up very brightly just after passing over us. then moved north out of sight.

content.detailedDescription: I was out on front porch getting fresh air , i live in the mountains so frequently enjoying looking at the bright stars so thought i would . i look up and first thing i see was a bright hovering low flying object looked like a star but larger and only 150 ft off the ground . the object  was not stationary , it definitely had a hard time staying in one spot . i then ran in and woke up my son to witness this ... he came outside and was shocked by the moving spinning orange and red object  hovering above  our front yard . we then looked to left  of house and noticed another one more blue in color , moving from  north across sky very easy to see it moving to east then was hovering behind trees .  we observed  both these objects for a good hour and a half . during the sighting we seen the orange and red object shut off completely then turn back on after a couple minutes . next to orange and red light we seen a fast moving light shoot by it moving very fast then disappeared almost like a shooting star ? . we took out iphones and took pictures of this object which came out very good ! zoomed in ,it definitely is a spinning egg shaped object !! we got it lol  ... we looked out over  house in back yard and there appeared to be another one hovering over the mountains  . we got tired of watching these objects so we went to bed while objects were still out there . that was it thank you .
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Me and my 16 year old son were on front porch observing hovering low altitude lights in sky that we're unable to stay in the same spot very obvious to us that they were low altitude hovering objects

content.detailedDescription:
Three of us were out one evening riding atv's along the ridge when we saw the ufo. at first we thought it was a some sort of small hot air balloon that was lit up. it was moving very quickly from south to north, then when it was almost out of sight it flashed in a multicolor of lights and almost looked as if it blew up. afterwards, we examined the photographs we had taken and came to the conclusion that it was not what we had previously thought. +

this object did not make any sound , just movement , it was a beautiful site  and was like a christmas tree . object was too fast to be a balloon , my son got very excited and nervous at the same time not knowing what this was . i'am 52 years old and have never seen anything like this before making me also wonder what this was , i firmly believe it was not anything made by earth men .I also have 1 picture that i had took , i have a new camera and could not get any more . please review and respond to my request and thank you for your time .
content.summary: Three of us was on top of ridge aronnd dusk. ufo quickly appeared from south.Moving north. it lite up very brightly just after passing over us. then moved north out of sight.

content.altitude: Treetop, 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription:
Im travaling in the car pool lane east bound on 10 fwy between euclid ave andcentral ave when i see it to my left hand side about 50 ft up.   it seemed to be keeping speed with me im riding a motorcycle as i exit the fwy it shoot acrosss and straight up over the freeway it was the size of a two storey house,bright blue, and i could not believe my eyes . i pulled over to the shoulder for a moment to collect myself then went off to the strip club {sperament rhino} of all places. when i arrived at the club it was still slightly visible and moving rapidly. i called over the bouncer to show him ,he and i watch it for about 1 minute tell it disapeared.  






ive also witnessed other thing but not sure if i want to discuss them
content.summary: Im travaling in the car pool lane east bound on 10 fwy between euclid ave andcentral ave when i see it to my left hand side about 50 ft up.   it seemed to be keeping speed with me im riding a motorcycle as i exit the fwy it shoot acrosss and straight up

content.detailedDescription:
Wednesday 4/15/14 i was on an american airlines flight from columbus, oh to charlotte, nc. the flight took off at approximately 7:10am. i was in seat 12f, a window seat on the right side of the plane. it was early so the moon was still out even though it was a bright sunny morning. it was a bright, white, full moon. at approximately 7:23 i noticed what i assumed to be a contrail from a plane. the trail was very noticeable because it was black and it was directly in front of the very white moon with blue skies and a few white clouds. my immediate thought was what plane leaves a black trail. as i continued to look at the streak i noticed that it appeared to be moving in relation to the clouds below it. i fly regularly for my job and always choose a window seat. i'm used to observing other planes but this caught my attention and i continued to observe it. originally the streak was perfectly level and the same height as the plane. as i observed, the streak began to angle at approximately 5-10%. it was then that i realized that it wasn't a streak and could possibly be a plane. all of the sudden the front end of the streak pointed straight down in what appeared to be a nose dive. it pointed directly down for about 1-2 seconds before it made an upside down u-turn and headed directly back in the direction that it had been traveling and went into the cloud below it. there is absolutely no way that a traditional airplane could make that tight of a turn. i watched as long as i could but it never came out of the cloud. 

i was purposely the last person to get off of the plane so that i could ask the pilot if they saw it. the pilot had already left the plane but the copilot who was also on the right side of the plane said that he did not see it but wishes that he had. from the front of the plane i believe that they could only see a black streak and were not able to see the streak take a nose dive or reverse direction. the copilot did mention that we flew over wright patterson afb but i can't imagine a military plane being that close to a commercial aircraft and attempting an upside u-turn maneuver even if they could make a tight turn like that.
content.summary: Object appeared to be a black airplance contrail but quickly changed direction

content.detailedDescription: I have spent countless hours star gazing from my hot tub hoping to see shooting stars.  it was between 1:45-2:15 am. i was facing south on a clear night with no moon, looking to the southeast when a very large, high altitude vessel blocked my view of the stars.  if i had not been looking where i was, i don���t think i would have seen it.  it was dark, no visible lights and almost seemed transparent or as if it was reflecting the starlight, almost invisible.  it was a large, triangular/boomerang shape that had rounded corners and the back was indented (not a typical straight lined triangle, but not a typical boomerang either).  it was completely silent and was moving faster than the high altitude planes i see all the time.  it passed just slightly to the east of me, moving south to north.  when it was to the northeast of me, it split into two identical vessels, side by side, and within seconds merged back into one.  at that point, i snapped out of my stunned state, went into the house, turned off every light, locked every door and window, and was very freaked out.  my husband was an industrial accident investigator who has been able to question me and help me write down the facts of my sighting. when he first was questioning me, to estimate how big it was, he had me hold my arms in front of me straight in the air to measure the distance between my hands, i had my hands 3 feet apart.  after we went outside that night to get a better perspective, i realized it was more the size of having my arms outreached and my hands one foot apart, still a very large vessel.  i have spent weeks going over this in my head and discussing it with my husband and family. the first shooting star i saw after the sighting, i almost jumped out if my skin.  i know what i saw was amazing and i am going to keep looking.
content.summary: Large, high altitude, dark, almost transparent triangular/boomerang shape completely silent that split into two identical vessels, side by side, and merged back into one.

content.detailedDescription: Was with my daughter getting into her car.  it was 9:32 am.  sky was blue with few clouds.  looked to the east and saw something small moving across the sky, seemed to be following the connecticut river, but not sure.  my daughter saw also.  i got binoculars and found it in the sky, it looked like four or five yellow globes or balloon like objects and something was hanging down from the object, whitish.  took a few picture of it.  did not see basket underneath it if it was a hot air balloon which at first i thought it might be.  there was no fire going up to globe shapes.  a white thing hanging down. it was moving across the eastern sky, very high up and moving north. i was excited and posted on facebook later on.  went and checked out images of drones and it didn't seem to fit at all.  went to images of wether balloons and it did not look like that at all.  it floated (?) off out of sight.
content.summary: Saw something far away, moving, up and down, floating (?) high in blue sky.

content.detailedDescription:
In july of 2009 my wife and i were coming back from a short three day vacation at disney world.  there is a stretch of road called sr91 which is between st cloud and ft pierce the road is lined with trees and the ground is mostly tall grassy wetlands.

while at the midway point my wife had her head down looking at the pictures on the camera which we had taken at disneyworld. out of the corner of my right eye on the west side of the road i noticed a green glowing ball.  i tried to get my wife's attention but i could not get the words to form.  the glowing sphere was right above the treeline and it appeared to move slowly.  i noticed the line of cars ahead of me were also slamming on their brakes.  i can only describe the green color as some sort of highlighter radioactive green.  

i stopped the car and watched it through the front windshield.  it slowly descended below the tree line which was approximately 100 feet off the ground.  i was traveling at 65 mph at the time and i was passing the vehicle.  when i slowed to 20-30mph i was traveling at about the same speed. the sphere appeared to be about 30 feet by 30 feet.  there was no exhaust, smoke or heat signature coming from the sphere. i was approximately 150 ft from the treeline.  i began to get out of my car expecting to see a crash or a ball of fire but nothing happened.  i then had an overwhelming feeling that everything was normal and i was suddenly driving down the road.  i don't recall starting the car or driving.  i asked my wife what she saw and she said she saw nothing. i would like to know what i saw.  is this a naturally occurring phenomena?  i worked for 8 years as a commercial pilot afterwhich i got a job as a law enforcement officer.
content.summary: While driving from disney world to ft lauderdale i observed a large green pulsating ball descend below the tree lines.

content.detailedDescription:
It was roughly 9:30 pm when i went to our back door to let the dogs in.  upon opening door one dog came in and the other still in yard.  i stood there waiting as i usually do on her.  i looked upward into sky above tree line facing northward and saw a very, very bright white light.  it was not moving at all.  i looked at it a minute or so then turned my eyes away for just a few seconds and looked back and it was gone.  i went out on deck and looked in all directions and it was gone.....Had it been plane or helicopter i would have seen it moving in a flight direction.  i only took my eyes off of it for maybe 10 seconds or so.  my 1st thought when i saw it was wow that is one bright light.  it appeared to be like looking at a star or plant way out into space.  had the appearance of that as it was solid white with maybe the edges kind of fading or hazy. it could not have been a star or plant as it was a huge bright light so i could tell it was very close above ground under where you would see clouds.  if i was to take my arm and extend out and upward with a closed fist, i could probably see the edges i would say.  that tells me it was extremely close.  it was not round or any particular shape on your questions, it was more like a star shape narrow at the top and wider at bottom, almost triangle but not quite.  first thought was omg that is bright and close.  after looking away and it was gone, was again omg where did it go.  i did not see it anywhere in the sky, it was just there stationary above tree line then 10 or sec after looking away then back it was gone.

i made a report back in 2013 of something 3 of us witnessed in apprx 2011 of orbs in triangle shapes in case #51149  log us-09282013-0016.  three whitish orbs north and same 3 orbs to the northwest and 1 single orb to the east.  

thank you for having a site allowing people to report things.
content.summary: Extreme bright light above tree top stationary.

content.detailedDescription: At the time i was laying in bed on my computer, it was about 12:30am ish when i first heard it but i couldn't see anything for about 20 minutes. this object was extremely loud and very low to the ground. at first i thought it was a plane or helicopter so t told my step dad and he said that no military plane or helicopter uses green or orange lights like what i saw. the object appeared to be in the shape of a boomerang but after i watched it for a while a big spotlight seeming light turned on and it was very bright but the other three light were on each tip of the object. during this time i didn't really know how to feel, i was kind of freaking out because i had no clue what it was and then i just thought it was really cool because i could possibly looking at an extra-terrestrial aircraft! i know i wasn't the only one who saw/heard it because i went on facebook and twitter and a lot of people were talking about it. i was in my room watching this thing from my window which isn't the biggest but i lost sight of the object because it went off towards the other side of town, opposite from my window and that's when the loud noise stopped. people in the other town over about a 5-10 minute drive from my location were hearing/seeing what they thought was to be a military plane but i don't think it was.
content.summary: It was very loud and low, and was in the shape of a triangle with three bright lights

content.detailedDescription: Me and i my mother were at the balcony smoking cigarettes and i usually stare up in the sky. then suddenly i saw this object moving from south. i said to my mother "hey, that one is moving". we both saw it. first i thought it was a satellite because i have seen satellites before. after a few seconds the object started to turn northwest. after that happened i told my mother "this aint no satellite", neither was it a plane. at one moment the object disappeared for a second and came back while the object was turning until it vanished entirely from our view because it moved right over the building we were standing.
content.summary: It came from south, was heading north

content.detailedDescription: While watching a movie i noticed outside of my window there was a bright  light shining down outside. curious as to what it was i got up and went toward my back door. i stepped outside and noticed it above my house, unsure of the hight in which it was hovering. it was round, and very very bright, the color was confusing for me, it was unlike any singular color ive ever seen. it was almost as if it were many colors at the same time. i was immediately frightened by the object, i could not tell if it was radiating light everywhere or just on my house, the light was just too bright. the object then at a seemingly impossible acceleration rate (stationary to max speed i saw instantaneously) shot across the sky to the north, and without slowing it then turned an exact 90 degrees and continued west where it seemed to have disappeared in the clear night sky. i had a adrenaline rush and it over all was not a pleasant sighting. this is not my first sighting of an object like this, but this was definitely the most frightening and over all negative sighting ive ever had. as soon as i was outside and in the light i got a very bad feeling and had a very negative emotional reaction.
content.summary: Eminence large light above house, upon going outside to have better look, ufo shot across the sky north then made a 90 degree turn west then dissapeard

content.detailedDescription:
This is an event witnessed by a friend of mine and interviewed by me.

all of the who, what, when, where, etc are included in the recorded interview.

my friend was sleeping in a tent with his brother in the late 1970's.

he got up to pee and saw three lights in the sky.  they appeared one at a time, then moved in a line, then moved into a triangle formation, made three distinct rotations, then went away again, one at a time.

the entire event took 2 or 3 minutes.

this happened in wheaton, illinois, a suburb of chicago.

i tried to ask him as many questions as possible for the most detailed information, as well as questions that people might ask him.

thank you very much for taking a look into this sighting and this video!

ps...My friend mentions an animation that i have yet to create.  he provided me with many details.  i will try to get this animation created soon.  thanks again!
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path then hovering
content.summary: Ufo event from 1978-79 wheaton, il, usa

content.detailedDescription:
Since my baffling sighting last year, the one i reported to mufon, i have quite often thought about my experience because it not only intrigued me but it was not the typical
" i saw a round flying saucer with blinking lights" sighting. what happened to me that night was definitely different from any typical ufo sighting i had ever heard of and it was almost unexplainable. i hoped for another day where it would come again while i was not alone so i wouldn't feel so crazy when explaining a huge flying flame right over my head with black gases rolling around in it to people lol i honestly keep it a little hush because it is so bizarre. 

well tonight, at about 10:20 pm almost exactly a year later, finally, i saw it again and it was moving through the same exact area as i saw it last time, my sisters yard. it was not nearly as close to me as the last one was, therefor it wasn't as large, but the plus side to tonights odd fireball sighting was that my sister and my niece both saw the flying orange flame right along side of me. my skeptical side thought chinese lantern at first due to its size but i quickly changed my mind. we watched it travel through the yard at about the height of the tree line, moving west in a straight line, not up, not down, but mostly straight, much faster than the one i saw last year, it continued a good straight distance then up a little higher to avoid some trees then straight again until it appeared to stop about a mile or two away where it hovered and began slowly changing colors from orange to red to green to a silver/white color while just hovering. seemed to be a little above the tree line at this point and way below the skyline. it remained in that same exact spot for at least 30 minutes. after running to the front and watching it from our street for forever. we got in the car to drive to it and at one point had it in our sight directly in front of our vehicle about half a mile up a country road. as we drove straight towards it we came down a hill and when we got to the top, a second or two later, it was no longer in front of us..Just gone. looked to the right of us, eastwardly, and there it was back in the direction of our house again where we had just left from about another two miles away. almost as if to avoid us. how did it get from in front of our car to 2 miles away in another direction in a matter of 2 seconds?  again, i am so baffled. we all are! and last year, even though my sister and niece experienced the huge white streak across the sky about 20 minutes after my first fireball sighting, i am so very glad that someone else finally saw the orange flame object that i saw last year! i just wish it was closer like it was last year. don't get me wrong... it was still very close but not nearly as close as it came to me last year. but this time my video worked :) and i have a lot of pictures. im thinking it was so close to me last time that it interfered with my cell and it also knocked our cable out. this time, there was a little distance so my phone did not fail!  but the same exact thing happened where it appears much much smaller in video and pictures than what we visually saw. also the shape changes in the video and pictures than what we visually witnessed as well. its so bizarre and i feel like a crazy person when i try to explain it lol a couple pics and the video showed two and three fireballs but we could only see one with our eyes. the shape and movement and all around appearance of what we visually saw is totally different than how it shows up in pics and videos. its a blatant flame like object when you look at it but in the video and pics it shows up as an orange boomarang shaped object and sometimes orb like and even shows up as more than one object in some of the pics and video but visually we could only see one. it is so bizarre but almost identical to my experience last year.
content.distance: 20 Feet or Less, 21-100 Feet, 101-500 Feet, 501 Feet - 1 Mile, Over 1 Mile
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Red and orange flame like fireball traveled a straight path above tree line then hovered and changed colors

content.detailedDescription:
1. i was alone at the time, and i was walking back to my room at the barracks after leaving the internet cafe.
2. it was a clear night and i just happened to look at the stars.
3. i thought it was one of our f-18/s on base, but it had a different shape and light pattern.
4. the triangle was equalateral, with pulsing white lights on the tips and not making any noise, while it was heading west, it maintained speed and direction.
5. i was trying to figure out what it was then realized i should report it in morning when i see my avionics supervisor. 
6. it flew past my field of vision as it went over the buildings to the west.
content.summary: Saw black triangle with white pulsing lights on all 3 tips and a center red light.  heading west making no noise and flying slowly.

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: We went to the beach to watch the sunrise.  we noticed 4 or 5 men in an open boat shinning a spotlight up at the sky (they almost ran aground).  we looked up to see why the men were shinning the light in the sky and we saw a star like object.  the object went ne at a fast rate of speed (at least 5,000 mph) then it stopped, went west stopped, then east stopped, then west stopped, then east and dissappeared.  we looked at each other and said,"did you see that?".  we felted excited and kinda strange to see a ufo, we were confused about what the men in the boat were doing.  the men in the boat turn around and left when we saw the object dissappear. it almost looked like the men in the boat were signaling the object with the spotlight and somehow knew the object was going to be there.
content.summary: We went to n.Bch, mi to see sunrise.  we noticed 4 men in a boat shinning a spotlight in the sky.  we looked up to see them traching a starlike object.  they almost ran aground .The object dissappeared over the pier after making abrupt stops and turns.

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: Driving on highway. ufo was hovering in valley. it was huge. 6,7,8 ,10 times the size of an aircraft carrier. huge. red,greenish,yellow lights circumnavigating the disk.Silent. you wouldn't know it was there if not looking in that direction.Huge.I stopped before the waielua bridge to make sure i was seeing, what i was seeing. lot's of others did too. someone had to have taken pictures. my iphone was dead. out of juice. i should have charged it while at work. duh. at least 20 vehicles pulled over to look at it. someone must have taken a picture. i'm going to contact pmrf and lehui control tower to see if they had radar pings. ? don't know. unidentified flying object
content.summary: Huge disk ...Huge

content.detailedDescription:
1. tidworth housing estate, also known as tidworth barracks, wiltshire..

me and 3 of my friends were hanging out, on the park near the esso garage..
it was late after 11 p.

looking up at the clear night, having a chat about what life would be like living on another planet, was the chatter at the time, so as we, or i stared into the nights sky, you couldn't help but look at the stars, in doing so, you get to know how the stars look... as i glanced across the skyline i noticed a formation' at first looked like stars, so i began to intensify my view, to my surprise...If you can imagine a triangle with the corner points cut off.... just below each corner two lights making a total of 6 lights' this looked like a star formation... inside the triangle was a circle. an the formation or 'triangle' could only be made out, because of the lights' or what appeared to be stars... again, with this you could make out the black circle inside the triangle.. 

i didn't know what to do' i just felt a rush or buzz as i couldn't take my eyes of it, i told my friend pete' to come an look, i had to get his eyes to travel along my arm to my finger to show him ware to look, an sure enough he sore it, it something that's been with me ever since. i'm not one to brag so i left it as is. well as soon as we saw it' it, only took a fraction of a second to disappear. it didn't go left or right, it went straight up.

there is 4 important factors here i would like to mention...

it happened above an army barracks
me an my friend both saw it.
more importantly we all 4 of us, had taken lsd.. 
any one who knows lsd, will know you can see more clearly and in detail what others cannot.
i have no reason to lie or make this up.

i would of included a sketch but i think the description here explains it p well enough.
content.summary: Late night out with friends on park, looking up, something looked odd, asked friend if he could see it... had to point it out.. when i did it took off...

content.summary: I am a airline transport pilot now retired with over 10,000 hours this incident happened while i was in contact with boston center on a scheduled airlines flight as captain flying for air new england

content.detailedDescription: Went outside to grab the babies diaper bag from the car and looked up to see two unusually bright lights, one of which i am pretty sure was a planet and the other moving next to it headed east overhead. i and my girlfriend have observed this light before numerous times and it always appears this time of year and is always moving in the same direction. it moved about 35 or 40 degrees through the sky then faded out as usual. photos were snapped with an android zeki tablet with a crap front facing camera... it was bright enough to register it as the only light in the sky, even next to planets and bright stars. look closely though as it is hard to see.
content.summary: Bright light moving west to east
